summary: This enables 3D sound positioning in-game. You'll hear exactly from which direction a sound is coming from.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/1897-0-1477930338.png[/img][/center]
[color=#ff0000][size=3]This does not work with Skyrim Special Edition, there is a seperate mod for that: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1897/?]Link[/url][/size][/color]
[size=4]
[u]Overview[/u][/size]

[size=3]This mod enables true 3D sound for Skyrim by using a so called HRTF to simulate binaural hearing using normal stereo headphones. You will hear exactly from which direction a sound is coming from.

This mod will give you an advantage over regular surround headphones by simulating how real physical sound is perceived by your brain through a HRTF. Something normal surround like 7.1 can't do is sound that comes from above or below.

Some technical inside how this works: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Head-related_transfer_function]HRTF on Wikipedia[/url]

Check out the video demonstration:[/size]

[center][youtube]4Fvd4V1hlB8[/youtube][/center]
[u]
[/u][u][size=4]Installation
[/size]
[/u][size=3][color=#ff0000]DO NOT USE ANY MOD MANAGER TO INSTALL THIS! COPY THE FILES MANUALLY.[/color][/size][size=3]

[/size][list=1]
[*][size=3]Extract the files to the Skyrim installation directory[/size]
[*][size=3]Launch the game and enjoy![/size]
[/list][size=3]
It is recommended to disable any other surround sound features of your headset or soundcard.
You will only get the desired effect if you use headphones!

If you have surround headphones (5.1/7.1) make sure you disable any surround processing.
Two channels (stereo) are sufficient for this mod to work.
Any further surround processing will distort the effect.

[size=3]You have to make sure that you have[/size] [url=https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=48145]Visual C++ Redistributable for Visual Studio 2015[/url] (the x86 version) installed.
[/size]
[size=4][u]Uninstalling[/u][/size]

[size=3]Remove the files from the Skyrim installation directory.[/size]
